scripts.install-deps: for dir in ./examples/*; do npm install --prefix "${dir}"; done
scripts.install-ci-deps: for dir in ./examples/*; do npm ci --prefix "${dir}"; done
scripts.build: for dir in ./examples/*; do npm run build --prefix "${dir}"; done
scripts.install-file-upload: for dir in ./examples/*; do npm install  @uploadcare/file-uploader@0.50.1-alpha.2 --prefix "${dir}"; done
